page.title: 16FARMING LIFE
page.content: The farmer had pig sheds which are no longer used because its uneconomic and they use them for the young lambs. The lambs are kept indoors for about 2 or 3 days until they are strong enough to go into the fields. The farmer also keeps 80{Beef Cattle} He used to have a{Hereford Bull}but now he is experimenting with a{ {Charollais Bull.}He changed because he did'nt get enough money out of the Hereford Bull. In winter he keeps the young calves indoors from October to April. He built a shed 14 years ago which holds 100 calves. The mothers are kept outside in the winter. They are fed turnips. His oldest cow is 17 years old. Normally he sells the mothers when they are 12 years old. All in all farming has changed from long ago.
